name: Kayla
review: The colors are great! I have 3.

name: Rachelle
review: Fits in pocket don't need a mirror to apply

name: jidi
review: Its good

name: Victoria
review: I use by it self it great

name: Rebecca the beauty guru
review: I have 2 of these and I just love them! Great color, feel and price! What's not to love?:)

name: Jay 36
review: I love this lip gloss. It goes on smooth and even. The applicator is soft. My boyfriend likes the taste and the way it compliments my skin tone.

name: KKRenee
review: I like this lip gloss and use it daily.  Love the color I chose and will continue buying more colors. It is good and taste good on my lips too !!

name: Kerae
review: I love this gloss. I bought sky pink because I heard it was a dupe for Turkish delight. It's a pretty milky pink that feels comfortable and lasts s Long time.

name: Susan
review: I love the light feel, general wear time, and colour selection of this lip gloss. The container is a little big for a pocket, but it is wonderfully moisturizing which more than makes up for this inconvenience.  I would definitely recommend this product.

name: monivery
review: I use this lipgloss all the time!

name: Kim
review: Love the color and shine

name: Watch lady
review: I use this every day. The colors are great, glides on easily and looks super. You do have to reapply several times a day to keep it looking good. Keeps your lips soft.

name: Tree
review: I only wish it came in more neutral shades. But I love it, I wear it every day.

name: PatinSpring
review: Easy to use.  No mirror needed. No mess.

name: KortneyLaRosa
review: I liked the glossy finish and not to overly sticky but I don't mind a sticky lip gloss I was just looking for a gloss that would make my lips look wet, this product sort of does that I feel like you could find something better but I do like its milky pink color it gives and it looks good over other colors, I use this for a very fresh youthful look!

name: Ms. Rhonda
review: very pretty color.

name: Reem
review: Easy to apply

name: Sheterra Sanders
review: I love these lip glosses. They are Moisturizing and glossy. The remind me of Mac cremesheen without the color payoff. I wish these glosses were more pigmented but everything else about them are fab! Loves it

name: The Office Flan
review: I don't normally like lipglosses, but these are very nice. They are moisturizing and not at all sticky, and the color payoff is pretty good. Much better than many other drugstore lipglosses (I'm looking at you, Covergirl).

name: Rennyt31
review: Nice product for a sheer lipgloss. Kinda pricey but you get a lot of product. Clean classic pretty packaging. Very comfortable. Lasts longer than NYX butter lip glosses.

name: Faith
review: I bought this product in "Kiss Me Coral". It is the perfect color for this summer season. Its the perfect shade, not too sheer, but not too bright. I find the formula very moisturizing, and just the right consistency. It doesn't have much of a scent, but this is a plus for me. Overall, it is a great product, and i will most likely be buying more shades in the near future :)

name: amilly
review: Not to sparkly,dont let the gold shimmer in tube stop you from buying it,it doesnt show the glitter. A great gloss for the perfect peachy nude lip.

name: ckelly
review: great color

name: Busylee
review:
I purchased this gloss for the color - a newer, trendy color that is currently hard to find. I thought it would be good going into late summer and fall. The color is called "Raisin" something or other, a rich brownish-brick.
However, when I put the gloss on - it is quite sheer. Not what it looks like in the tube. It spreads out to a brighter berry color. Ok, but not what I wanted. I will be returning it.

name: Glam So Sweet
review: I love it.

name: DJ
review: I use the product daily.  It is my "go-to" lip gloss.  I wear it especially when I wear natural earth-tone shades and or colors that go well with peach/orange colors.  (I also like another color from this line that comes in a pinkish shade for when I wear red or pink.)  I wish the color would last longer and not have to be reapplied as often; but I manage with it as it is.

name: Kelly
review: Great product

name: Makeup  lover
review: I  fell in love with this liogloss,  and the color is amazing.

name: Nikki
review: To transparent

name: KJ
review: It would have been nice to have opened it.

name: Gabriella
review: Love this product. I've used this for years!!! 90% of the time I wear the nude color but I own several other colors that they have. I rarely wear the pigmented versions alone. I usually add it to a lipstick or lipstain just because super lustrous wears off so easily so I like to have a longer lasting lip product underneath. If there's any streaking or dryness, this gloss evens out the whole look and keeps my lips moisturized. But I literally wear this product every single day. Even at night while I'm asleep! That's how lovely it is. I can't stand Chapstick or any other of the 20+ different "moisturizing" lip products I've used. The next best lip moisturizer would be a product by neutrogena but nothing that moisturizes provides color like super lustrous by revlon. The color pay off is very good.

name: TBAmommy
review: This gloss may be nice if you are looking for a sheer hint of color. However, I was hoping for more opaque pigmentation.

name: Lena
review: Keeps lips shiny for hours

name: mocha
review: The gloss is shiny. Smooth application.

name: Jamie
review: This gloss formula is very thin and wears off easily.  I think a thicker slightly sticky consistency stays on longer.  The old version of this gloss in the square tube was EXCELLENT!  Please bring back the "old" formula and colors!

name: Olive
review: While there was definitely some color payoff, it wasn't nearly what I expected when purchasing such a bold color. However, it gives a nice flush of color for everyday and feels great on the lips- both hydrating and not sticky at all.

name: Dee
review: The color in the tube does not appear on your lips, and I was expecting a little more shimmer on my lips. Try a little flavor in you glosses!

name: lipstickcrazy
review: I've used these before and gave them as gift because hey SALE. The colors are beautiful and the gloss formula was easy for my friend to use as she's just beginning to use lip products.

name: Red
review: This product kept my lips moist and I only had to re apply if I wiped it off.

name: Sierra
review: This product is not opaque, but I do love the color it gives. I own it in the color pinkissimo and find that it is the perfect glossy slightly pink lip for me. If you have a darker skin than my pale self you might find it a tad frosty. The best part about this gloss is the shimmer is intense without being chunks of glitter that will stay around the edge of your mouth after the color has worn away- in fact I find the color to wear off pretty evenly. This gloss does have the typical stickiness a gloss has, but it is not a distracting amount. The smell is there, but not overpowering and slightly pleasant.

name: Debra
review: I have one at my desk, in my purse and in my car! I don't go without it  : )

name: Sarah
review: I love Revlon's line of lip glosses, but the color was not as it appeared from outside the tube.

name: spunky
review: I put more than one layer of the gloss on and still you could barely see any of the color in the middle of my lips but it sure did show around the edges and it looked bad.

name: Farishta824
review: Not impressed with the formula, I didn't like how the color was not vibrant for a hot pink. It looks very dull on the lips, more mauve if anything.

name: Rachel B.
review: There was barely any color to this once applied and it lasted maybe 45 minutes.

name: Rachel
review: I love these lipglosses so much! I have four of them right now and I will continue to purchase these!

name: Melissaba
review: Doesn't last

name: Yes for makeup
review: I use this product just about everyday. The color is perfect for a natural everyday use.

name: Natasha
review: Its nice color

name: Angela
review: needs lasting color and shine

name: lolo
review: Luv it but I use it almost everyday but I will have to buy more soon..almost gone..

name: Jo
review: Great just wish it lasted longer

name: sweetlady
review: great price love this lip gloss

name: CamiS
review:
At any given times I have at least three lipsticks in my purse but this one is the one I reach for more than for the others. It's like an old friend that no matter what is always there for me whenever I need it.

I like its shine and thickness. It has a very faint smell, so faint I can't compare it to anything. It stays on my lips as long as I don't eat it (I have a tendency to lick my lips :/). Good moisturizer for dry climate. By far my fave shade.

name: Bless your Heart
review: I have resigned to the fact that lip glosses always need reapplying to get the required results.

name: Grammy Patti
review: This gloss is very flattering and not sticky at all...that's why I it' my favorite.

name: Rita
review: It's so luscious...

name: Stacy
review: Great product that a friend recommended.

name: MrsEstes
review: I have very full lips and usually stay away from gloss, but I was tired of using matte. I have been experimenting with red as well, something else I avoided because of my full lips. However, I feel more comfortable with this than the overly prices NARS matte red lip stick I purchased. It also itsn't drying which is great.

name: Ariane
review: This lip gloss is not sticky nor does it dry my lips. Sandstorm is a pretty color for a nude or natural look.

name: Anonymous
review: I had my eyes on this baby for the longest time. I really wanted the shade "Super Natural" because it seemed like such a nice, pretty, everyday go to gloss. And that is EXACTLY what it is. I was so happy when I finally decided to buy it. I wear it almost everyday and I think it just pulls that natural makeup look off so well. It's a gloss, so it doesn't last through things like meals or snack that well but it doesn't transfer too much when I drink things. I do have really fair skin and this shade does not look dark on me all all.

name: Luhhndynn
review: This is my go-to lip gloss. I love the color and subtle sparkle. Though some days it doesn't last as long as I'd like, it's still my fav.

name: Chi
review: The product applied evenly and was extremely glossy until it completely rubbed off but it smelled sort of like robittussin or something like that... some sort of medicine.

name: Amy
review: Definitely will buy it again

name: Tammy
review:
Picked this up because I was looking for a red-orange color. Looked great in the container but the color doesn't wear the same on me. Basically, ends up being just a regular lipgloss.

Nice if you are just looking for a basic lipgloss, but not a lot of color.

name: pinkpanther59
review: Snow pink looks pink in the container, but it actually goes on clear. Super glossy looking. Supernatural is just about the perfect shade for maybe just about everyone. Its not over the top, but gives your lips a kitten amount of color. Rosy Future is lovely as well. Its of course sheer but with a bit more pink (red) to it, incase Supernatural is too light of a color for you.

name: Von
review: I purchased this and thought it would have at least a mild coverage.  Its too sticky and I will not buy it again.

name: Superkay
review: See my product suggestions...

name: Crafty Girl
review: I finally found a lip gloss that isn't sticky

name: Ali
review: Returning the product

name: Natural one
review: Love to use it everyday. Good value and colors. My favorite product to use.

name: CC Texas
review: my lipstick of choice

name: smart shopper
review: Love the color and the texture, just thick enough to last but not tacky or sticky, and the perfect amount of shine!

name: Jord
review: This product is not true to color. Which mad it useless for me bc I do not like super glossy lips.

name: T-Dogg
review: Love the color. Ligjt shimmer you can wear anytime.

name: Jajo
review: Love the color and look just wish it would be a thicker consistency (stickier) so it would stay on longer

name: Jajo
review: Love the color and look just wish it would be a thicker consistency (stickier) so it would stay on longer

name: Olivia
review: I bought this product in the Skin Pink color because I wanted a really light and pretty pink for creating natural looks. When I first applied it it wasn't great but I liked the color so I left it on, about ten minutes later it turned into this awful consistency and was clumping on my lips, absolutely horrible. I was very disappointed by this product and wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

name: Joy
review: Love this gloss

name: Angel
review: It's o.k, but I prefer lip colors that last longer.

name: Pink
review: Didn't like it at all. Very disappointed

name: Cassie
review: I bought from this line specifically because I wanted something light and glossy, and it's exactly that! It's applicator brush is a perfect size and the tube has quite a lot of content in it! I got it in the color "Sky Pink" and love it's fresh, light feel. It is a bit sticky at first so when it's windy outside so you'll definitely get your hair stuck on your lips but that's just apart of wearing lip gloss! It doesn't have a scent at all and and doesn't taste like anything either so it's not uncomfortable to wear. It does wear off so I'd recommend reapplying every hour. Still worth the buy!

name: Lulu
review: I use this product everyday. Works well by itself for a little color or over a lip stain to give a bit of gloss. I have one in every bag and ever jacket. Xoxo

name: FairLady
review:
I have been using Revlon's Super Lustrous Lipgloss for many years and I will continue, the colors and texture are the best of any cosmetic line that I have tried. The color Pango Peach is a true pink coral color
and absolutely beautiful, plus it stays on well and stays glossy along time...always buy 2 at a time, don't want to be without it , one for my purse, one for my makeup table..
Revlon has always been #1 in lipsticks and glosses for reasonable price too.

name: Cathy G. G.
review: I love these lip glosses so much I keep it in my front pockets of jeans so I can always grab it.

name: Dgonzales
review: Love the fact that it's not sticky on my lips.

name: Mo
review: Glossy

name: Cookie
review: Over lipstick

name: Chrissy
review: Perfect gift

name: RR
review: I bought the color #215 Super Natural, which is a very pretty pinky nude color. Color payoff is not so great. It shows up like a clear pink gloss, but I still love it so much!!!!! It gives you a very pretty plumpy, glossy lips. It is not sticky at all. Very hydrating. I went to ulta to buy a second one.

name: Teres
review: Doesn't feel sticky or taste bad.  Just enough color and shine.  Very pretty

name: Siara Marie
review: There is more gloss than color. The gloss has some thickness to it but doesn't last as much as I'd like. It's more like a every day use gloss instead of a special occasion makeup. I have to add a lipstick to add a bit of more color.

name: Amanda D
review: Not a fan of the sticky gloss feel. The sparkly pink gets sparkles everywhere! Not a big fan.

name: Kari
review: I bought 1 lipstick before just to try and I really liked that I went I tried another color, love them both, so this is my new favorite lipstick brand to use

name: K
review: This gloss is ok.  It wears off very easily.  The color is good for a more neutral gloss look, however.

name: Kat
review: Good overall product

name: Liz
review: This lip gloss is a must have in my makeup bag, I have been using this for years!!!

name: Anney
review: Love this color, it goes well with anything. Pretty good quality for the price.

name: janetplanet73
review: I got this because I heard it was a dupe for Nars Turkish Delight. I don't have that one so i can't say if it is or isn't, but its a very pretty, soft milky pink. It just doesn't seem like the smoothest, opaque app. and can get a tad goopy. but it is very pretty if you like soft, cool tone pinks.

name: Cheyy
review: The shade is perfect for my light skin tone. Great texture and easy application. Saw this on a monthly favorite for one of the makeup artist I watched on YouTube, I already had the lipstick shade so I know I would love the gloss. Perfect nude shade with a hint of pink that looks amazing with my skin tone!

name: EasyE
review: perfect for everyday casual look

name: Kathy
review: Use as an everyday lipgloss.

name: Krystal
review: This product is great for day to day use.. very happy with texture and color.

name: Wuhoo
review: This shades go well with almost everything!

name: Ladyleo
review: I got 2 one I will use for gloss only other I will try use lipliner to bring out color.will buyagaing.

name: None
review: None

name: Leah
review: I am so in love with Berry Allure, it's not even funny.  When it is first applied it doesn't seem very deep in color but within a few minutes it gets deeper and more beautiful.  It WILL mildly stain your lips, but I don't mind, and I actually like that.  I have very dry lips with noticeable cracks and this gloss is incredibly moisturizing.  It evens out my lips and makes them appear fuller.  I will definitely be buying other colors of this soon!

name: Lip gloss lover
review: I use the product to add a little touch of color and shine.

name: Sandi59
review: Love it!Would buy this product again!

name: Jazz
review: I love this product I would most definitely buy this product agin I have the Pango Peach & I love the gold shimmer or reflects in it. It's so pretty!!!

name: Farilyn Fonroe
review: I got this in pinkissismo and it has a very nice sheer pink color it isn't sticky doesn't dry out your lips although I would prefer the nyx soft matte lip cream

name: V Lady
review: The gloss creates kissable and attractive lips

name: Curly girl
review: Though the color is near perfect, the fact that I have to reapply every hour or so is not what I want to do at all.

name: Sweetsz
review: I love these lip gloss there so smooth beautiful color slection. They would be amazing if they were long lasting.

name: Amelia
review: This is amazing. Glosses normally don't hold that long, but this one stays well for a solid 4 or so hours. Doesn't get dry and clumpy. It wears off gradually in a subtle way.

name: Jazz
review: I absolutely love Super Natural Revlon Lipgloss!

name: Jlough
review: The bareminerals glosses are my all time favorite - these glosses compare to it. The consistency is a tad less thick, which I think makes it a little less long-lasting. But! I love these for the price. I wouldn't say they are as opaque as the bareminerals either but I actually don't mind that for everyday use! Considering glosses wear less time anyways.

name: Dar
review: I use this Pango Peach as a hightlight on the lips.  I love that it goes on smoothly and easy to applied.  Would buy this again.

name: Dar
review: Love this color.  Rosy Future does not stay on the shelf very long.  Lucky I found it in the store, which I bought 1 and 2nd for half price.  The second color I bought to try is Pango Peach. My only con is need more color selection.  I love that it apply very easy and not sticky like most other lip gloss do. Will buy again.

name: Yari
review: It's beautiful!!

name: krys the beauty guru
review: based on the color of the tube i was hoping for more pigment. you couldn't even see any color there was just a thick gloss. i will not wear again.

name: Natural girl
review: Glides on smooth and easy to apply and carry.

name: Kate
review: Always kept in my purse for anytime my lips need a little extra shine!

name: Nana
review: Only apply two coats. That's enough to show the sparkles

name: Valerie
review: I stumbled upon this lip gloss over a year ago and have bought a few more since. Great price and color.

name: Sarah the Teacher
review: Great product! The only thing I would change is its taste. It's not bad, but not good either. Still, I have already bought two more colors to add to my collection! Great buy!

name: Wanda
review: The color is great and I use it day and night. Love the glossiness of it.

name: Bunny
review: Very nice lip gloss in general. In the bottle the color looked different than it did on which was a bummer. But I like it over a similar shade of lipstick. It's not too goopy either.

name: Clinique lover
review: This gloss is just the right weight, not too heavy or sticky.

name: Panda bear
review: I wear it everyday

name: lorisjourney
review: Although this is not long lasting, it is comfortable and not sticky (which is a purchase breaker for me). And for a lip gloss, this is great.

name: No nick name
review: Easy to use, color is true.

name: sesa
review: Great natural color, great for everyday use or for special occasions! Love it!

name: Richie's Mom
review: Beautiful color.  Does not dry lips out.  Is not too sticky.

name: Mo
review: I love how the gloss is not like other glosses pertaining to how usually you can feel the glitter in the gloss, this gloss you don't feel the glitter. Very smooth!

name: Rachel J Beauty
review: This gloss has been a surprising win in my beauty collection. I only have Super Natural at this point. The consistency is awesome - it's not sticky, and doesn't smell grossly like food. It looks wonderful and wear great over pink, nude, AND red.

name: Jas
review: It's amazing i love it

name: Bonnie
review: Love it!  Need more colors.

name: Cyndi
review: Looks so shiny and natural.

name: Bwash
review: I love this product! So smooth and pretty

name: Hedda
review: Great product.... Great price

name: Girlfriend
review: Use it all the time

name: Julie Q
review: I love this gloss for touch ups through out the day.

name: Shawn
review: I would recommend this product. Neutral color

name: AnnaB
review:
By looking at the gloss, it has some shimmer in it but when you put it on your lips, you cannot see that shimmer. Also, it does not look like the color it should be when you put it on.
Did not last long either. I won't be buying it again.

name: HotLAVA
review: I purchased the Colorburst Lipgloss in Peony along with a Revlon Super Lustrous Lipgloss as a part of the Buy 1 Get 1 50% off deal. The Colorburst comes in a cute, slender tube. The color is pretty on my fair skin. However, the texture of the gloss leaves much to be desired. It's slightly clumpy because of the micro-glitter/shimmer and can feel tacky on my lips if I don't reapply about once per hour. I thought Revlon's Super Lustrous Gloss was FAR superior. Given that, I wouldn't purchase the Colorburst Lipgloss again knowing there are better choices for the same price within Revlon's line.

name: Tarik
review: I am totally in love with this gloss! A single coat gives just the right amount of pigmentation and shine for a casual, sheer pop of color. A couple extra coats gives you more color and TONS of shine! I have this in Sugar Violet and I love to layer it over a red lipstick to give more depth and a purplish hue to the color. This is also very hydrating as glosses go. If I can't find a balm, sometimes I just wear this to bed. It also smells nice, like butter and sugar kind of. Not sure if this was intentional but I like it. Highly recommend it!!!

name: kika
review: On its own sheer gloss.

name: memphis
review: simple to use,silky,non-gooey

name: Smcriz
review:
Product is great for protecting lips in harsh weather.

Product goes on evenly with just a hint of color.

Product can be used alone or in combination with other color products.

name: Sweetcheeks
review: Keep in my pocketbook all the time. Love it

name: Caroline
review: Love the colors

name: MissBrunzy
review: I love Revlon lip products, they know what they are doing. This particular color (Berry Allure) is the most perfect sheer-ish berry color that works for everyday and night. So shiny and not sticky too. Perfect!!

name: Cait
review: Amazing! Bought Berry Allure today. I apply over Soft Lips lip balm. Stains lips a really beautiful color, which I like. You can really build up the color, or apply lightly for a more subtle look.

name: Emz
review: Swiped this right over a nude lip liner and it was the perfect combo!!

name: Kathy
review:
Nice everyday lipgloss- natural glossy and pairs well with lipsticks
Longevity not that great

name: Cynt
review: I like the Lip gloss.

name: Not a lipstick person
review: I like this glossy colored lip gloss . It's a beautiful neutral something for me that is hard to find.

name: Cathy
review: I just love everything about this product. It wears well and also is not sticky like others I have tried. I'm so in love with this lipgloss!!!

name: MiMi
review: This lipgloss looks amazing by itself, over lipstick, pretty much on anything. I love how glossy it is and how long it last, and the color selection. I HAVE TO BUY MORE.

name: nikki
review: love

name: Emily
review: I picked this up one day for my collection while doing a little drug store shopping, and I wanted a nice light pink lip gloss so I picked up "sky pink". I realized later after looking around online, that this is a straight up dupe for Nars lip glosses, for the exception that it is slightly stickier. It's great! I intend on buying more.

name: Alex
review: Always my go to for it's sheen and color.

name: Shortymac
review: This is a very nice natural lip gloss. It comes off a little easily but that's why we always reapply
